turkish_example_sentence: O kritik durumu bilmese, bu hatayı yapmazdı.
english_example_sentence: If he didn't know the critical situation, he wouldn't make this mistake.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он не знал критической ситуации, он бы не совершил эту ошибку.
